sect1.para: PHP\Manipulator is a system with the purpose to allow easy manipulation of php-code based on it's tokens. Those manipulations can be used for example to remove code for production (comments) or apply your own Coding-Guidelines to it.
Some examples based on already implemented actions:

itemizedlist.listitem: Convert old style-constructors (method based on the classname) to new ones (__construct)
Change short tags into long tags
Change asp tags into long tags
Add public to class-variables or methods which don't have it
Format and Indent Code according to your own defined Coding-Standard
Comment-out includes and requires when using autoloading
